rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0001
rows.name: This is the Life Point location?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0002
rows.name: There's nothing here-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0003
rows.name: Lin, please double-check the coordinates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0004
rows.name: R-Right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0005
rows.name: What is this... feeling of unease...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0006
rows.name: No way...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0007
rows.name: Elma-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Multiple unidentified heat signatures!
We're surrounded![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0010
rows.name: This is... a trap...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0011
rows.name: Disarm, humans![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0012
rows.name: A species I haven't seen before...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's doggies-meh!
Woof woof-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0014
rows.name: Th-They're not![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0015
rows.name:
It seems this is the first time
you've seen us, the people of Lars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0016
rows.name: Earthlings. You are completely surrounded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Lay down your weapons and surrender quietly.
We promise to treat you as proud warriors deserve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0018
rows.name: Everyone, resistance is futile in this situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0019
rows.name:
(That damn Luxaar...
So he set the stage for us, did he?)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0020
rows.name: (But such a trivial mission...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0021
rows.name: Elma-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0022
rows.name: It's okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0023
rows.name:
I'm the leader.
Take me, but I want you to release my subordinates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'd like to accommodate your feelings, but
we are mercenaries. We cannot go against our employer's wishes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0025
rows.name: We'll have to invite all of you to the Growth stronghold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0026
rows.name:
Weren't the Growth supposed to annihilate us?
Why take prisoners?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0027
rows.name: Good question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Indeed, the Growth fear you Earthlings.
But that fear is only regarding your original bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0029
rows.name: Our original bodies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0030
rows.name:
Why?
Why do they fear our bodies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0031
rows.name: Who knows. I don't know the details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0032
rows.name:
If I knew,
we'd foil that bastard's plans ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0033
rows.name: Prince Ga Derg[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0034
rows.name:
What do I care about Luxaar's position?
I wasn't ordered not to leak secrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0035
rows.name: Take them away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0036
rows.name:
(Luxaar?
Is that the leader of the Growth?)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0037
rows.name:
Wait.
There's just one thing I want you to tell me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Why has a noble race like yours
sunk to being mere henchmen for the Growth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0039
rows.name: What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0040
rows.name:
How many despicable acts the Growth
have committed on this planet[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0040_2
rows.name: You must know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0041
rows.name: They don't possess a shred of morality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0042
rows.name:
And yet you still
obey the Growth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Watch your words, Earthling.
Can you possibly understand His Highness's feelings?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0044
rows.name: Everything is for the sake of our people, who lost their homeland.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0045
rows.name:
For that reason, His Highness
made a painful decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0046
rows.name:
I can't say I understand those feelings.
But humans also lost their homeland.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0047
rows.name:
Nevertheless, we chose the path
of fighting the Growth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0049
rows.name:
True, we are mercenaries allied with the Growth.
But we have not lost our pride as Larsians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0050
rows.name:
Then show me.
Your pride, in your own way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0051
rows.name:
The Growth look down on you
as uncivilized barbarians, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0052
rows.name: In my eyes, you appear as strong enemies who understand reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0053
rows.name: Earthlings! Fight us here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0054
rows.name:
If you win... yes...
I shall permit you to leave this place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: xs09060100_SEL0011
rows.name: Raise voice saying you accept the challenge.

rows.label: xs09060100_JNK0020
rows.name: Be Wary

rows.label: xs09060100_SEL0021
rows.name: Shake head with vigilant gaze.

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0055
rows.name: A good answer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0056
rows.name:
Showing mercy would only be an insult.
I shall come at you with full power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0057
rows.name:
You damn Earthlings probably don't know, but
we warriors of Lars do not break our word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0058
rows.name: You'll have to trust me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Your Highness! If we do this, Luxaar
will not stand for it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0060
rows.name: Sorry, Bou.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0061
rows.name:
I can no longer endure
going along with their ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0062
rows.name:
We all feel the same.
But if word of this reaches his ears...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0063
rows.name:
Do you think the people of Lars cannot endure
returning to a life in poverty?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0064
rows.name: No. If it is to see Your Highness smile like that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0065
rows.name:
So that's how it is.
Prepare for one battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0066
rows.name: This is our way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09060100_MSG0067
rows.name: Bring it on.[ST:wait ]
